tasks.title: Phase 1: Template-based CommandExpert
tasks.description: Create CommandExpert class following MicroExpert pattern. Template-based predictions (no ML). Parse .git-ml/actions/ for python -c patterns. Build keyword→command mappings. ~3-5 days effort.

tasks.title: Phase 2: Context-aware patterns and calibration
tasks.description: Wire feedback loop for command success/failure. Learn context→command patterns. Add confidence calibration. Target: >65% accuracy, ECE <0.15. ~3-4 days effort.

tasks.title: Phase 3: CLI suggest-command integration
tasks.description: Add suggest-command to hubris_cli.py. User-facing command suggestions with explanations. Track adoption rate. ~4-5 days effort.

tasks.title: CommandExpert data collection milestone
tasks.description:
Track data collection for CommandExpert to become useful.

Current state (2025-12-18):
- 41 unique commands (target: 500)
- 1 python -c pattern (target: 50)
- Collection rate: ~14 unique/day

Estimated ready: ~50 days (2026-02-07)

Check progress: python scripts/hubris/estimate_command_data.py

Milestones:
- [ ] 100 unique commands (basic pattern matching)
- [ ] 500 unique commands (useful predictions)
- [ ] 10 python -c patterns (python -c feature viable)
- [ ] 50 python -c patterns (python -c feature useful)
